howToPlay.overviewDesc: Time Bomb is a social deduction game where players are secretly divided into two teams:
howToPlay.goodTeamDesc: Find all the defusing wires before time runs out
howToPlay.badTeamDesc: Prevent the Good Team from winning, ideally by triggering the bomb
howToPlay.socialDeductionNote: Players don't know each other's roles. Communication, bluffing, and deduction are key!
howToPlay.teamsRolesDesc: Players are secretly divided into two teams â€” you won't know who's on which team!

howToPlay.setupStep1: View your secret role and cards
howToPlay.setupStep2: Claim how many defusing wires you have â€” everyone sees your claim (you can lie!)
howToPlay.playingStep1: Players take turns in random order (1 turn each per round)
howToPlay.playingStep2: On your turn: cut one wire from another player (not yourself!)
howToPlay.playingStep3: The wire is revealed to everyone
howToPlay.betweenStep1: Unrevealed cards are reshuffled and redealt (1 fewer card per player)
howToPlay.betweenStep2: Found defusing wires stay revealed permanently
howToPlay.betweenStep3: The bomb stays hidden if not yet cut
howToPlay.goodTeamWin: Reveal ALL defusing wires before Round 4 ends
howToPlay.badTeamWin: Bomb is revealed OR Round 4 ends without all defusing wires
